enchantment.epic_core_api.sunder_armor.d: Reduce the base armor value of the attacked entity by 0.5 points per enchantment level, lasting a duration based on the enchantment level.
jei.epic_core_api.steel_hammer_jei_infor: Used to grind some ingots into dust.
item.epic_core_api.black_copper_ingot_up: Black Copper Ingot Upgrade Smithing Template
death.attack.soul_damage.player: %1$s's body wants to escape%2$s, but unfortunately their soul hasn't kept up
enchantment.epic_core_api.divine_wrath.d: §cThe original damage type of weapon is replaced by void damage.
jei.epic_core_api.steel_ingot_jei_inform: Can be smelted from Iron Ingots.
enchantment.epic_core_api.sacrifice.desc: §5Reduce the maximum health of the attacked entity by the enchantment level.
enchantment.epic_core_api.soul_protectio: When suffering soul damage, reduce the soul damage by the value of the enchantment level.
enchantment.epic_core_api.phantom.desc: §5Immune to Fall Damage, and has a 0.1*enchantment level chance to be immune to damage.
enchantment.epic_core_api.poisoning.desc: Inflicts a level of poison effect based on the enchantment level.
jei.epic_core_api.mithril_blast_furnace_: No matter what item is smelted, it takes 2.5 seconds per item.
jei.epic_core_api.elder_metal_wreckage_j: Generates between layers 1 and 32 in the Overworld’s ocean biomes, with an average of 2 groups per chunk, and an average of 4 per group.
enchantment.epic_core_api.explosion.desc: Cause a MOB-type explosion based on the enchantment level when the arrow touches an entity or block.
jei.epic_core_api.mithril_ore_jei_inform: Generates between layers 1 and 32 in the Overworld, with an average of 5 groups per chunk, and an average of 3 per group.
enchantment.epic_core_api.reflection.des: §5When blocking, reflects damage value*0.1*enchantment level of magic damage to the attacking entity.
jei.epic_core_api.silver_ore_jei_informa: Generates between layers 16 and 64 in the Overworld, with an average of 4 groups per chunk, and an average of 9 per group.
